language.label: Language
language.description: Select your preferred language for Msty. If your desired language is unavailable, you can contribute translations through our i18n repository.

autoGenerateChatTitle.label: Automatically Generate Chat Title
autoGenerateChatTitle.description: When enabled, new chat titles will be generated automatically. For chats using online models, the title will be based on the model used and the first two messages exchanged. For conversations using a local model, title generation is always active and may result in increased token usage.

enableLinksInChatMessages.label: Enable Links In Chat Messages
enableLinksInChatMessages.description: Enable or disable links in chat messages. Disabling this will prevent links from being clickable. We recommend disabling this for security reasons.

description.manual: The latest updates are checked periodically and you will be notified when a new update is available. You can manually check for updates.
description.automatic: The latest updates are checked periodically and installed automatically. You can also manually check for updates.

modelsInfo.label: Models Info
modelsInfo.description: Update your local model metadata. This information includes details about each model, but not the model files themselves. This applies to both locally stored and online models

appSettings.label: App Settings
appSettings.description: Resetting app settings to their defaults can help resolve potential issues. This will restore the default user preferences, such as appearance and models path, but will not delete any data, including chats or downloaded/imported models.

dataPaths.label: Data Paths
dataPaths.description: All data, including models, conversations, settings, and logs, are stored locally on your device. Only modify the contents of these directories if you are familiar with the application's file structure

helpAndDiscussions.label: Help & Discussions
helpAndDiscussions.description: Connect with our community on Discord to get support, share your feedback, and stay informed

proxyAddress.label: Proxy Address
proxyAddress.description: Specify proxy address to route network traffic. If no address is provided, Msty will auto-detect your device's network proxy address. If configuration is reset, you need to quit and restart Msty.

editModelsPath.label: Edit Models Path
editModelsPath.description: Set your desired location for downloading the models.
editModelsPath.willRestartLocalAIWarning: Note: Changing the models path will restart the Local AI service for the changes to take effect.

serviceHealth.label: Service Health
serviceHealth.description: Current Local AI service status. If you are experiencing issues with Local AI, please try restarting the service.

serviceEndpoint.label: Service Endpoint

description.base: The address of the Local AI service to connect from other applications.
description.serviceIsNotRunning: Once the service is running, the address will be displayed here.
description.serviceIsAvailableOnNetwork: Because the service is available on the network, you can also connect to it using the Network Service URL from other devices.

serviceEndpoint.copyLocalURL: Copy Service Local URL to clipboard
serviceEndpoint.copyNetworkURL: Copy Service Network URL to clipboard

editPortNumber.label: Edit Port Number
editPortNumber.success: Local AI Service port number saved
editPortNumber.failure: Could not save Local AI Service port number

serviceVersion.label: Service Version

description.base: The version of the Local AI service.
description.mac: You can check and update to the latest version or uninstall the service completely.

serviceVersion.startServiceToCheckVersion: Start the service to check the version.

updateService.success: Local AI Service has been updated to the latest version
updateService.failure: Failed to update Local AI Service to the latest version

uninstallService.label: Uninstall Local AI Service?
uninstallService.description: Your models are NOT removed and stay where they are. Future chats with the downloaded models will be disabled unless you reinstall the service.

serviceConfigurations.label: Service Configurations
serviceConfigurations.description: These configurations get applied to the Local AI service when starting. The Local AI service will automatically restart after you modify and save any of these settings.

configurePortNumber.label: Configure Port Number
configurePortNumber.description: Port number on which the Local AI service will run. Leave it empty to use the default port.

maximumParallelChats.label: Maximum Parallel Chats
maximumParallelChats.description: Maximum number of concurrent chat sessions (when using split mode).

maximumLoadedModels.label: Maximum Loaded Models
maximumLoadedModels.description: Maximum number of LLMs loaded concurrently. Keeping more LLMs ready in memory enables faster initial responses, but consumes additional system resources.

enableNetworkAccess.label: Enable Network Access
enableNetworkAccess.description: Allow other devices on your network to access this Local AI service via this device‚Äôs IP address.

allowedNetworkOrigins.label: Allowed Network Origins
allowedNetworkOrigins.description: List permitted network origins here (comma-separated). Each entry must begin with http:// or https://. Use * to permit all origins.

captureServiceLogs.label: Capture Service Logs
captureServiceLogs.description: Capture service logs for debugging purposes. We recommend enabling this only when necessary.

advancedConfiguration.description: Enter valid JSON to set environment variables for the Local AI service.

reset.success: Service configurations reset to original values

chatModelConfiguration.label: Chat Model Configuration
chatModelConfiguration.description: These settings apply to all installed models during chat sessions.

modelKeepAliveTimeout.label: Model Keep-Alive Timeout
modelKeepAliveTimeout.description: Time (in minutes) to keep a model loaded in memory after use.

advancedConfiguration.description: Enter valid JSON to pass extra parameters to models during chat sessions.

save.success: Configuration saved and will be applied during chatting

reset.success: Chat model configuration reset to original values
reset.failure: Failed to reset chat model configuration

remoteModelProviders.label: Remote Model Provider | Remote Model Providers

noModels.label: No AI Model Providers Added Yet
noModels.description: Get started by adding a new provider such as Open AI, Mistral, Google Gemini, Perplexity, Open AI compatible endpoints, remote Ollama, remote Msty, etc.

description.whereToGetKey: You can get the key from your API provider's website.
description.whereItsStored: By default, we save your API keys securely and locally in your operating system's keychain. You might be asked for your credentials when saving and retrieving the key.
description.linuxKeyringConfiguration: There is a known issue on Linux where, if you have misconfigured your keyring, you might not be able to save your API key. Please make sure your keyring is properly configured. You can also try saving the key not in the keyring but in the app's database. This is less secure but might work.
description.keyHintInfo: {keyHint} is just a hint. The actual key is saved securely in your operating system's keychain unless you choose to opt-out of using keychain. If you want to update the key, just provide a new key and click on the Update button.
description.ifOllamaOrMstyRemote: To be able to try fetching models automatically, you need to provide the API key again.

deleteItem.label: Delete model provider {providerName}?
deleteItem.description: This will only delete the model provider key and associated models. Previous chats with models from this provider will NOT be deleted.

fetchModels.label: Fetch Models
fetchModels.description: Provide a valid endpoint and press Fetch Models to retrieve available models
fetchModels.error: Could not fetch available models. Is the service endpoint correct?
fetchModels.info: Attempting to fetch available models at {endpoint}

remoteModelProviders.openAICompatibleUrlInfo: Make sure to include http:// or https://

defaultModelPrompt.label: Default Model Prompt
defaultModelPrompt.placeholder: Click to set the global default model prompt...

realTimeDataSearchQueryPrompt.label: Real-Time Data Search Query Synthesize Prompt
realTimeDataSearchQueryPrompt.placeholder: Synthesize Real Time Data search query...

aurum.label: Aurum License
aurum.description: Unlock all the premium features of Msty by activating your Aurum License.

activate.label: Activate Aurum License
activate.failure: Could not active your Aurum License. Please try again. {errorMessage}

activated.description: Thank you for supporting Msty! Your Aurum License is active and you have unlocked all the premium features of Msty.

aurumLifetime.label: Aurum Lifetime Access Club
aurumLifetime.description: Join the golden circle of supporters with one time purchase of Aurum Lifetime Access and unlock all the premium features of Msty forever.
aurumLifetime.notASubscription: Note: This is a one-time purchase and not a subscription. Upgrading from Aurum License to Aurum Lifetime Access is not possible.

activate.label: Activate Aurum Lifetime License
activate.success: Thank you! You are now a star of the Aurum Lifetime Club!
activate.failure: Could not activate your Aurum Lifetime License. Please try again. {errorMessage}

activated.label: Aurum Lifetime Access üåü
activated.description: You are a star of the Aurum Lifetime Access Club! Thank you for supporting us and welcome to the club!
activated.additionalNote: Your support has allowed us to focus on adding new features and improving the app without any external influences. üôè
